txt.en: 'Hi there! Are you ready to get caught up with the story? I can complete the next four chapters of the Black Book of Mordor for you.\n\n'Speak to me when you're ready, and I'll put pen to paper and write this all down!'
Completion of this quest will flag your character as having completed the Black Book of Mordor, Chapters 5-8.
Talk to MadeOfLions to complete chapters 5-8 of the Black Book of Mordor
'Ready to complete chapter 5-8 of the Black Book of Mordor? Here we go!'
